name: Racing Manager
description:
- Manage your very own Racing Team. Compete in amazing 3D in high action races, controlling your drivers orders and helping them boost to victory!

- Develop and manage your race team, invest in new cars with over 25 different vehicles to choose from ranging from the ordinary to the exotic.

- An in-depth Research and Development system allowing you to improve everything from Turbo Boost to the Grip on your Tires!

- Hire and Fire new drivers, manage your sponsors to take your team back to the glory days, winning promotions back to the top league!
